description: Alleged fraudsters used a silicone mask to pose as a French minister in an elaborate scam.
title: Seven on trial for fake French minister Le Drian scam
title_page: Seven on trial for fake French minister Le Drian scam - BBC News
maintext: At the time Mr Le Drian was defence minister and not especially well known internationally - a fact that apparently made the fake more believable. The money was often said to be for ransom payments to hostage-takers, or anti-terror operations.
